May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar **Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 73 **Price** 1,400 gp **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** 2 **Base Weapon** [Arquebus](/Weapons.aspx?ID=195) --- This _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [fearsome](/Equipment.aspx?ID=731) [arquebus](/Weapons.aspx?ID=195)_ is composed of warped and twisted wood engraved with eerie runes. When the weapon fires, the blast sometimes sounds like the cackling of a diabolical witch. **Activate** command; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You afflict a creature you can see with a hex of _impending doom_. The hex lasts for 1 minute. As long as the creature is hexed, when you hit it with a round from the hex blaster, the creature must attempt a DC 28 Will save at the end of your turn; the creature attempts a single Will save regardless of the number of times you hit it. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). It also takes 1d6 [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
**Failure** The creature is frightened 2. It also takes 2d6 persistent mental damage.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 2 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute. It also takes 4d6 persistent mental damage and is cursed with a hex of _impending doom_. If the target falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) from damage dealt by this Strike or the persistent mental damage, it remains unconscious for 1 day or until this curse is removed. After 1 day, if the creature is still unconscious, it must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or die; this effect has the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) and [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) traits.
name: Hex Blaster
